item.description:
We'll have a discussion with snacks and wine, and then head out for some more drink and song at lime light( RSVP is needed for the Karaoke). I am asking for a $10 cover fee for the snacks and to cover the rental charge for the sky room. Please feel free to bring your favorite wine and snack extra monies will be refunded.

Here is what this event is meant to be:

It's basically a SOCIAL event that includes reading a book and getting together once a month to discuss the book, Then having some drinks. This meet-up, which I hope to offer once a month, is aimed at sharing, good, scientific literature, philosophical literature, inspiring stories, and the occasional piece of fiction.Read more
item.how_to_find_us: Please aim for 28 Amherst st. My # 7743604702 we will be at Tommy Doyles This month.
item.name: March Book and Wine (The Blank Slate by Steven Pinker)
